Reviews.Title: “Nice rooms, nice price, nice location”
Reviews.Author: Stephen&Gemma
Reviews.Content: nice hotel money paid ridiculously expected walking distance train station numerous attractions recommend hotel friends probably wouldnt stay i’d prefer check hotels offer rome

Reviews.Title: “not clear of hostel location when booking”
Reviews.Author: iwander711
Reviews.Content: booked hostelworldcom staying central location near train station roma checked particular building tried stay building farther questionable alley near embassy lots soldiers walking machine guns safe friend 2 single females werent people staying building quickly contacted front desk told placement unacceptable somehow found building originally booked clean careful book staying

HotelInfo.Name: Carlito's Way Hotel and Hostel
